name: Doggo Boye's Fantastic Adventure!
description:
This game should NOT be played by children under 16 or those who are easily disturbed.

*

Join Doggo Boye on his first and last adventure! Collect dog bones, wall jump across levels, and have a good time!

This game is a one-time spiritual spin-off to the Catto Boi series, so you should be already familiar with the style!

If the game starts to act out strangely, run.

*

Join the community Discord!
discord.gg/E6ZuKH9
